channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump hints at ‘flexibility’ on reciprocal tariffs while balking at more ‘exceptions’
item.description: Stock indexes rebounded from a morning selloff after Trump’s tariff comments to finish the day with narrow gains.

item.title: The truth about ‘condoms for Gaza’: DOGE canceled $33 million USAID contract treating 350,000 HIV patients
item.description: In an exclusive interview, Trish Karlin of the Elizabeth Glaser Pediatric AIDS Foundation discusses the impact of $32.7m worth of contracts being term...

item.title: This nutrition expert avoids a so-called health food at all costs: he says you’re better going full fat instead
item.description: Low-fat yogurt often contains artificial sweeteners and added sugar and flavors.

item.title: Apple is reportedly willing to lose $1 billion every year just to fuel its streaming ambitions
item.description: Unlike other peers, the streaming service's small library focuses almost exclusively on original content like Severance and Ted Lasso.

item.title: CEO of $30 billion homebuilding empire sees ‘weaker-for-longer’ housing market as consumer confidence plummets
